name: Toasted (Tori Smith)
description:
Toasted: An Interactive Fiction Game by Tori Smith

You are a teen employee for the Rewind Theater in your small town. Your coworker, Liam, got a little too high last night and apparently misplaced a film reel of Planet Battles, for which there is a sold-out screening tonight. 

Find it and put it in the projector or you're, like, totally fired my dude. 

Credits & Special Thanks:

  • Basic Help Menu plugin by Emily Short
  • Advisement by Clara Fernandez-Vara

How to play Interactive Fiction:

  • "How To Play Interactive Fiction" by Andrew Plotkin — design by Lea Albaugh
  • "A Beginner's Guide to Interactive Fiction" by Stephen Granade and Emily Short
  • Type "help" and press "Enter" to pull up the help menu in the game.
